review: I love my fire TV stick I have no problem with it and will be getting another one soon the service is good.

review: Very satisfied. This is the third one I ordered. My kids really love it.

review: Will not work with verizon fios router..  Verizon told me to wait for a fix or get a different isp...  Are you kidding me?!

review: I couldn't believe how easy it was to install. Really pleased with my purchase.

review: the fire stick initally could not be set up. I had bought this as a Christmas gift for my parents. they had slow internet speed. with that, the inital setup could not be comepleted. I brought it over my house and set it up on my net connection. works great.

review: Quick and easy to set up!

review: It's OK. Interface is face. Very easy to use, but where are all these movies they speak of? Could be I don't know how to use it yet, but I see a few hundred movies not these thousands they claim

review: I actually prefer this over my C*Cast.It is lacking as far as screen casting but the remote is such a huge bonus.It really comes down to having a remote over having to use phone and computer apps.Smart move Amazon.

review: So much to see. I love Amazon prime.  Lots of free movies games and books!
